## Universidades 

```{r}
library(leaflet)
data(quakes)

universidades <- data.frame(
  Universidade = c("Universidade Federal da Paraíba" ,
                   "Universidade Federal de Viçosa",
                  "Universidade federal do Paraná"
                   ),
  lat = c( -6.96179,-20.7546,-25.410177), 
  long = c(-35.6953, -42.8825,-49.251011))
greenLeafIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://leafletjs.com/examples/custom-icons/leaf-green.png",
  iconWidth = 38, iconHeight = 95,
  iconAnchorX = 22, iconAnchorY = 94,
  shadowUrl = "https://leafletjs.com/examples/custom-icons/leaf-shadow.png",
  shadowWidth = 50, shadowHeight = 64,
  shadowAnchorX = 4, shadowAnchorY = 62
)

leaflet(data = universidades) %>% addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~long, ~lat, icon = greenLeafIcon, label = ~as.character(Universidade))
```
